name: Extract Marketing Insights from TikTok Videos Using Dumpling AI and GPT-4

nodes.name: Form: Submit TikTok URL + Product Info

parameters.text:
=Here is a TikTok transcript. Analyze it for the following:

1. Determine whether the speaker is describing a **problem**, a **solution**, or **both** regarding the keyword: "{{ $('Form: Submit TikTok URL + Product Info').item.json['Keyword '] }}".
2. Extract:
   - Pain points
   - Desired outcomes
   - Triggers or motivating events
   - Interesting direct quotes or phrases

Transcript: {{ $json.transcript }}

options.systemMessage: =You are a customer research analyst. Your job is to extract actionable marketing insights from user-generated content like TikTok transcripts.

nodes.name: Parse: Separate Insights (pain points, outcomes, etc)

parameters.instructions: I want to extract the output from the AI agent into own separate outputs. So extract the pain points, desired outcomes, triggers or motivating events, interesting direct quotes or phrases
parameters.codeGeneratedForPrompt: I want to extract the output from the AI agent into own separate outputs. So extract the pain points, desired outcomes, triggers or motivating events, interesting direct quotes or phrases

nodes.name: Google Sheets: Log Insights + Post Copy

value.Video URL: ={{ $('Form: Submit TikTok URL + Product Info').item.json['Tiktok Video URL'] }}

nodes.name: GPT-4: Rewrite Transcript as Marketing Post

parameters.text:
=Analyze the following TikTok transcript and determine whether the speaker is primarily describing:

- a **problem** related to the keyword "{{ $('Form: Submit TikTok URL + Product Info').item.json['Keyword '] }}".
- a **solution** they've found, or
- **both** a problem and a solution.

Then, rewrite the transcript with the following goals:

1. Frame our product or service "{{ $('Form: Submit TikTok URL + Product Info').item.json['Product '] }}" as the ideal solution to the problem, or a key part of the solution being described.
2. Preserve the speaker’s tone, voice, and informal/social style.
3. Make it sound like a natural social media post or spoken monologue.
4. Ensure it's conversational and authentic.


Transcript: {{ $json.transcript }}

options.systemMessage: =You are a persuasive copywriter skilled at rewriting user-generated content to position a product or service as the solution to customer problems or goals, while preserving the original voice and tone.

parameters.content:
### 🎯 Workflow Summary

This workflow takes a TikTok link and product keyword,  
extracts the transcript, and uses GPT-4 to generate:

- Key pain points  
- Desired outcomes  
- Motivating events  
- Direct quotes  
- A rewritten post for marketing

All results are saved to Google Sheets.

Tools: Dumpling AI, GPT-4, LangChain, Google Sheets

json.body:
{"transcript":"WEBVTT


00:00:04.720 --> 00:00:07.920
bookmark it later because you're gonna wanna check out each of these platforms

00:00:07.921 --> 00:00:09.600
if you don't know what AI agents are

00:00:09.601 --> 00:00:11.800
they're probably the hottest thing in AI right now

00:00:11.801 --> 00:00:13.680
first one is relevance AI

00:00:13.681 --> 00:00:16.520
and I love this platform for use cases like sales

00:00:16.521 --> 00:00:18.140
marketing and research

00:00:18.200 --> 00:00:21.480
makes it super easy to build agents that have access to tools

00:00:21.481 --> 00:00:22.880
number two is Stack AI

00:00:22.881 --> 00:00:26.080
it's one of the best agent builder platforms for Enterprise

00:00:26.081 --> 00:00:29.900
Lock 2 certified easy to plug in to your internal data sources

00:00:30.080 --> 00:00:32.000
No.3 is n8n.io

00:00:32.001 --> 00:00:35.160
which has been around for a long time as a workflow automation tool

00:00:35.161 --> 00:00:36.640
but they have some neat features

00:00:36.641 --> 00:00:38.960
makes it easy to build AI agents

00:00:38.961 --> 00:00:43.440
No.4 is taskade this is a very opinionated project management tool

00:00:43.441 --> 00:00:46.960
where you can assign tasks to different agents on your team

00:00:46.961 --> 00:00:48.640
like before market research

00:00:48.641 --> 00:00:51.440
follow up on this lead write a report etcetera

00:00:51.441 --> 00:00:53.320
No. 5 is Flowise AI

00:00:53.321 --> 00:00:58.100
I love it because it's open source and you can build chat bots and AI agents

00:00:58.160 --> 00:01:00.160
No.6 is mindStudio dot AI

00:01:00.161 --> 00:01:04.280
it integrates with over 50 LLMs and you can plug in your data sources

00:01:04.281 --> 00:01:06.160
No. 7 is Vectorshift dot AI

00:01:06.161 --> 00:01:07.840
I personally haven't tried this one yet

00:01:07.841 --> 00:01:09.760
but I like that they have a starter plan

00:01:09.761 --> 00:01:11.080
and just like the other platforms

00:01:11.081 --> 00:01:12.680
you can build AI search engines

00:01:12.681 --> 00:01:14.440
AI assistance chat bots

00:01:14.441 --> 00:01:15.640
automations etcetera

00:01:15.641 --> 00:01:18.080
now if you do have a little bit of Python coding experience

00:01:18.081 --> 00:01:21.920
then the two frameworks you're gonna Wanna check out are Microsoft's Autogen

00:01:21.921 --> 00:01:25.920
and Crew AI which just announced a huge partnership with Nvidia

00:01:25.921 --> 00:01:29.440
both platforms make it super easy to create multi agent teams

00:01:29.441 --> 00:01:31.518
with complex hierarchy structures
","language":"en","id":"7457297253338828075","originalUrl":"https://www.tiktok.com/@sabrina_ramonov/video/7457297253338828075?is_from_webapp=1&sender_device=pc&web_id=7436093910231483960"}
